function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Travel history to Wuhan before and after travel restrictions","Impact":"Potential for spreading the virus from Wuhan to other locations","Mitigation":"Implement and enforce travel restrictions, conduct health screenings for travelers","Technologies":"Health screening technology, travel restriction enforcement technology","People":"Travelers, general public","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Increase in human movements out of Wuhan before the Lunar New Year followed by rapid decrease","Impact":"Potential for spread of virus through increased human movements","Mitigation":"Enforce strict travel restrictions, lockdowns, and social distancing measures","Technologies":"Geolocation tracking, lockdown enforcement technology","People":"Local residents, travelers","Owner":"Government, law enforcement agencies"},{"Description":"Seeding of epidemics in China from Wuhan","Impact":"Potential for widespread dissemination of SARS-CoV-2 from Wuhan to other regions","Mitigation":"Implement strict quarantine measures, conduct extensive contact tracing and testing","Technologies":"Quarantine monitoring technology, contact tracing apps","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare authorities"}]}
